conbody.p: Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX supports the following extension types:

li.p: FXS: FXS extensions will assign to the relevant analog phones or fax machines connected to the PBX's FXS ports.
SIP: SIP is the standard protocol for VoIP handsets and soft phones.
IAX: IAX is the "Inter Asterisk Protocol", a newer protocol supported by a few devices and soft phones.
